patreon_benefits_notice: You lose the benefits after the subscription ends
patreon_benefits_disclaimer: These benefits may change at any point
for_being_such_a_great_game: for being such a great game
window_priority_desc: Keeps window on top of other windows
show_friends_desc: Hidden in case there are no friends online
analytics_desc: We collect your in-game name, level and id and which clients are installed
beta_desc: Requires access permission from the game's dev
ui_improvements_desc: Changes some UI parts in the game
points_notification_desc: Notifies you in case any points are full
events_notification_desc: Notifies you in case you receive a message or a notification
level_up_on_next_loaded_page: Load any page in the game to level up
after_update_message: Update has been downloaded. Installation will start once you fully close App Hub. Can take up to a minute and requires relaunch.
author: Author
mobile_client_desc: Enjoy the experience of SimpleMMO at your computer. Simple yet smooth, just the way you are used to.
mobile_client_end_line: Better than ever to keep the authentic SimpleMMO feeling.
chat_client_desc: Keep in touch with your SimpleMMO friends and enemies alike with enhanced chat options. Whether you're in-game or busy working, stay in the loop, find the best deals, and hit your mark more easily than ever.
player_popup: Username right click functionality, including quick access to player profiles
tag: Username left click functionality to easily tag other players
item_popup: Item click functionality, including full access to item information without leaving chat
tag_notifications: Windows notifications when other players ping you
scroll_auto_update: Disabled chat auto-update when reading old messages to prevent interruptions
chat_access_outside: Full access to chat outside of SimpleMMO
chat_client_end_line: Chat Client is everything you've wanted in SimpleMMO's chat, and now it's here.
gpvp_client_desc: Hug your friends and enemies alike with Guild PvP Tool.
partial_generation: Two-Part generation of targets to avoid rate limit
gpvp_client_end_line: Make it quick and save your time.
